A text representation of the hand action classifier.

## Declaration

```swift

```

## Describing a hand action classifier

- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the hand action classifier suitable for debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the hand action classifier that’s viewable in a playground.
